title: Need: Arndt and Barbeau - sharp corners clean fronts
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: Need: Arndt and Barbeau - sharp corners clean fronts
posts.post_content:
Want to buy Arndt and Barbeau low grade examples ("A" grades even) with sharp corners and clean fronts.

If you've got either for sale, please send pic and asking price.

These are the last two that I need to complete page 1 of my binder set (20 pocket pages).

Thank you!
